document.full_text: vassilis sevastis, the president of greece's track federation, said that the triple-jumper hrysopiyi devetzi had been barred for two years for failing to submit to a doping test in may 2009.
document.title: sports briefing | doping: greek silver medalist barred for refusing test
lines_and_colors: vassilis sevastis, the president of greece's track federation, said that the triple-jumper hrysopiyi devetzi had been barred for two years for failing to submit to a doping test in may 2009.
